Component Library

Use these componenents via the markup and/or sass provided.

Arrow

<span class="arrow"></span>
<span class="arrow-small"></span>

@extend .arrow;
@extend .arrow-small;

Dialog Box

<div class="modal-dialog-background">
  <div class="modal-dialog">
    <h1>Submit Quiz</h1>
    <div class="inner-wrapper">
      <p>You've completed the quiz. Submit the quiz to record your answers.</p>
    </div>
    <div class="buttons">
      <button type="button" class="cancel">Cancel</button>
      <button type="button" class="submit">Submit</button>
    </div>
  </div>
